name: Verbeeg Marauder
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Simple Weapon Wielder: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.Multiattack: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.
